details.excerpt: Nick has joined Honest Buildings in London to lead Market Development in the UK and Europe. He has a background in commercial property agency and brokerage and has worked for several of the largest firms in the US and the UK. His transactional experience spans the office, industrial, retail and hotel sectors where he acted on the behalf of both landlords and tenants. details.description:
Nick has joined Honest Buildings in London to lead Market Development in the UK and Europe. He has a background in commercial property agency and brokerage and has worked for several of the largest firms in the US and the UK. His transactional experience spans the office, industrial, retail and hotel sectors where he acted on the behalf of both landlords and tenants. After moving across seas to pursue his passion in sustainability, in London Nick first worked for the UK Green Building Council and then joined Colliers International as their Senior Sustainability Advisor for two years prior to joining Honest Buildings. Nick believes that through sharing information freely and showcasing great building projects delivered the world over, the bar for building performance will be raised globally.
